<template>
  <main id="main-home"></main>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SweetProjects",
  components: {},
  computed: {
    chunkedProjects() {
      return chunk(this.projects, 3);
    },
  },
  methods: {
    chunk(array, chunkSize) {
      let chunkedArray = []
      for (let i = 0; i < array.length; i += chunkSize) {
        const chunk = array.slice(i, i + chunkSize);
        chunkedArray.push(chunk);
      }
      return chunkedArray;
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    console.log("SWEEt PROJECTS MOUNTED");
  },
};
</script>
